conbody.p:
If you no longer want to use a route, you can archive it. The following conditions apply when you archive a route:
You can archive a route that is in the released state.
You cannot archive a route that is in the draft state.
You cannot modify an archived route. However, if you want to use an archived route in future, you can revise or copy the route.
An archived route is not available for use in a work order or a process order.
After you archive a route, you cannot reverse the action.
